TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_iliyad, title = iliyad, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/iliyad} }

S.FORM: a tja kineljang tua segeris (Greece) a senay a nakemasicuyan mavan aicu a "iliyad (a tja siaya a /'ɪliəd/; kinavecikan a kai a segris a nasemicuayan: Ἰλιάς; sivecivecik a ruma ta: Iliás)." pakavecik ti humer taicu a sinansenayan a pasusangas ta 2700 a cavilj. namasan sangasangasan a vinecikan tua senay nua i iyurupu (Europe). a tja kineljang tu izua "audesi " a masanitalj a nasemicuayan a sinansenay ni humer. patjara aicu a "audesi" a sitjaucikel tua cinalivatan ni audisius (Odysseus) nu pasuvililj tua tjaucikel a "iliyad." a itua situcuan a sinansenay a "iliyad" izua 15,693 a takalan a pinakavecik ta matjadrusapuluq sa sepatj a sinansunatj. aza sivecivecik ni humer a kaian a segris, aza tja kineljang taicu a kinakaian a iyunik gerik katua zumanga a kinakaian. == kaizuan ==

a tja kineljang toa segeris (Greece) a senay a nakemasicoyan mavan aico a "iliyad (a tja siaya a /'ɪliəd/; kinavecikan a kai a segris a nasemicoayan: Ἰλιάς; sivecivecik a roma ta: Iliás)." pakavecik ti homer taico a sinansenayan a pasosangas ta 2700 a cavilj. namasan sangasangasan a vinecikan toa senay noa i iyoropo (Eorope). a tja kineljang to izoa "aodesi " a masanitalj a nasemicoayan a sinansenay ni homer. patjara aico a "aodesi" a sitjaocikel toa cinalivatan ni aodisios (Odysseos) no pasovililj toa tjaocikel a "iliyad." a itoa sitocoan a sinansenay a "iliyad" izoa 15,693 a takalan a pinakavecik ta matjadrosapoloq sa sepatj a sinansonatj. aza sivecivecik ni homer a kaian a segris, aza tja kineljang taico a kinakaian a iyonik gerik katoa zomanga a kinakaian. == kaizoan ==
